name: IN THE ARMS OF THE NIGHT
name_original: IN THE ARMS OF THE NIGHT
description:
POLYMER DESPAIR presents: a novel-length Twine...

☽ IN THE ARMS OF THE NIGHT ☾

It came as a shock...

A couple of years ago, you knew a shy but nice research student - even hooked up with him, a couple of times. You fell out of touch, but now he's back...

...and he's become a giant bat, twice your size, with big ears, big eyes, and wings that can wrap around you like a blanket.

For some reason, it's only made him hotter.

As if navigating your rekindled relationship wasn't enough, you've got your local super-criminal network to deal with - and they're just dying to get to know the new couple...

Experience IN THE ARMS OF THE NIGHT, the latest twine from the brain that brought you BATWORLD and DEMON DATE: a monster romance between you (the reader) and a big anthropomorphic man-like bat - or is it the other way around?

DEMO VERSION AVAILABLE - the first three chapters for free!
